events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but want to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly and the color is not what I expected.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with product fit and color, categorizing the case under Refund.
Assigning the case to refund specialist agent for further assistance and processing of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'd be happy to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn to proceed with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've only tried the jacket on once; it is in perfect condition and still has the tags attached.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid label attached to this email to return the jacket within 14 days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today using the prepaid label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund. The amount should be reflected in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund successfully and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Thank you for contacting us. As your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
We have sent you a short survey to collect your feedback about your refund experience. Your input is important to us.
